record.title: RECESS UNTIL FRIDAY, SEPTEMBER 14, 2007, AT 9:45 A.M.
record.narrative:
RECESS UNTIL FRIDAY, SEPTEMBER 14, 2007, AT 9:45 A.M. -- (Senate - September 12, 2007)

[Page: S11518]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand in recess under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 3:20 p.m., recessed until Friday, September 14, 2007, at 9:45 a.m.
